movie.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
movie.plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione continue their quest of finding and destroying the Dark Lord's three remaining Horcruxes, the magical items responsible for his immortality. But as the mystical Deathly Hallows are uncovered, and Voldemort finds out about their mission, the biggest battle begins and life as they know it will never be the same again.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 45 wins & 91 nominations.
